entities.name: toffee

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Harry Potter's son who is a real practical joker.

entities.name: engorgement charm
entities.description: A spell that is being cast on the toffee, causing it to grow in size.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Dudley's mother who is sobbing hysterically and tugging his tongue.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Aunt Petunia's son who appears to be suffocating under the pressure of his mother and his tongue.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Dudley's father who has lost control completely and is throwing a china figure at Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person who is trying to help the situation with his wand.

entities.name: china figure
entities.description: An ornament that Uncle Vernon threw at Mr. Weasley.
